scripts.start: npm run prep-dist && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-manifest && esbuild --watch --bundle --sourcemap --outdir=dist --define:__PRODUCTION__=false ./src/js/background.ts ./src/js/contentScript.ts ./src/js/popup.ts
scripts.start-ff: npm run prep-dist && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-manifest-ff && esbuild --bundle --sourcemap --outdir=dist --define:__PRODUCTION__=false ./src/js/background.ts ./src/js/contentScript.ts ./src/js/popup.ts && web-ext run --source-dir=dist
scripts.build: npm run prep-dist && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-manifest && npm run lint && npm run compile && esbuild --bundle --minify --outdir=dist --define:__PRODUCTION__=true ./src/js/background.ts ./src/js/contentScript.ts ./src/js/popup.ts
scripts.build-ff: npm run prep-dist && npm run copy-assets && npm run copy-manifest-ff && npm run lint && npm run compile && esbuild --bundle --minify --outdir=dist --define:__PRODUCTION__=true ./src/js/background.ts ./src/js/contentScript.ts ./src/js/popup.ts && web-ext build --source-dir=dist
scripts.dist: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r extension.zip *
